price: 10. J’ai donc dit : “Implorez le pardon de votre Seigneur, car Il est Très Absoluteur !
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
